test.name: TEST-DEF-00010
test.description: Call the SET_MODULE_SCHEDULE function from an authorized partition and check that the partitioning schedule is altered starting at the next major time frame (MTF) start (with GET_PARTITION_MODE). Check that a call to SET_MODULE_SCHEDULE with the current schedule produces no change. Check that the call from a non-authorized partition fails with an HM process/ partition event.

teststep.description: Get the current time, sleep for one tick, get the time again and measure the difference. Must be equal to 1 for at least 19 times.
Call SET_MODULE_SCHEDULE for schedule 1, and check that INVALID_CONFIG is returned, for operation not allowed.
Check that the last step differs (MTF - P0) ticks execution window from the previously stored value.

Get the current time, sleep for one tick, get the time again and measure the difference. Must be equal to 1 for at least 19 times (the same value as before), since the schedule change only takes effect in the next MTF
Get the current time, and check that it differs MTF from previously stored value.
Get the current time, sleep for one tick, get the time again and measure the difference. Must be equal to 1 for at least 9 times (the value from the new schedule).
Get the current time, and check that it differs MTF from previously stored value.
